files.patch: @@ -108,0 +108,4 @@ + * Unless otherwise specified, any {@code Calendar} method containing the + * parameter {@code int field} will throw an {@code ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException} + * if the specified field is out of range ({@code field} < 0 || + * {@code field} >= {@link #FIELD_COUNT}). @@ -1842,2 +1846,2 @@ - * @throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if the specified field is out of range - * (field < 0 || field >= FIELD_COUNT). + * @throws IllegalArgumentException if this {@code Calendar} is non-lenient and any + * of the calendar fields have invalid values. @@ -1871,2 +1875,0 @@ - * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the specified field is out of range - * (field < 0 || field >= FIELD_COUNT). @@ -1889,3 +1891,0 @@ - * @throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if the specified field is out of range - * (field < 0 || field >= FIELD_COUNT). - * in non-lenient mode. @@ -2804,0 +2803,3 @@ + * @throws IllegalArgumentException if this {@code Calendar} is non-lenient + * and any of the calendar fields have invalid values or if {@code field} is + * {@code ZONE_OFFSET}, {@code DST_OFFSET}, or unknown. @@ -2826,0 +2828,3 @@ + * @throws IllegalArgumentException if this {@code Calendar} is non-lenient + * and any of the calendar fields have invalid values or if {@code field} is + * {@code ZONE_OFFSET}, {@code DST_OFFSET}, or unknown. @@ -2845,0 +2850,3 @@ + * @throws IllegalArgumentException if this {@code Calendar} is non-lenient + * and any of the calendar fields have invalid values or if {@code field} is + * {@code ZONE_OFFSET}, {@code DST_OFFSET}, or unknown.
